article_text: With a U.S. Senate primary featuring incumbent Pat Roberts and Milton Wolf, some moderate Kansas Republicans say they won’t cast any vote. GOP insiders say Roberts has shifted to the right over the years to stave off exactly the type of tea-party challenge that Wolf represents.

article_metadata.news-keywords: Pat Roberts, Milton Wolf, Kansas, Republicans, moderate Republicans, U.S. Senate, politics
article_metadata.title: Choice between two conservatives in Senate primary frustrates moderate Kansas Republicans | The Kansas City Star

article_summary:
With a U.S. Senate primary featuring incumbent Pat Roberts and Milton Wolf, some moderate Kansas Republicans say they won’t cast any vote.
GOP insiders say Roberts has shifted to the right over the years to stave off exactly the type of tea-party challenge that Wolf represents.
